meaningInfo: The <radical>king</radical> can <radical>see</radical> the <kanji>present time</kanji> for what it really is. The future isn't important. The past isn't important. The present is when everything <kanji>appear</kanji>s.
readingMnemonic: People are constantly asking the king to do things for them and solve their problems. But the king can see exactly what needs to be done at the present time, and what can wait until tomorrow.
readingInfo: At the <kanji>present time</kanji> the king is <reading>Gen</reading>ji (<ja>げん</ja>). The time has finally come for him to get serious, and as they say, there's no time like the present.
